TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it horribly corrupted!

Articles.Content:
Yu get a million and 1 pounds of frog poop

i wish for a lump of iron mixed wih silver and platinum sounded by plutonium cover in in uranium and topped with a cherry

Granted. The radioactive computer/fission reactor that is dropped off at your house works quite marvelously.. until SWAT storm your house and shoot you (killing you) accidentally. (More or less.. raids be dangerous.)

(Something about suspicious buildup of potential nuclear weapons... who would have thought.)

I wish for command of a SWAT Team.

Granted, but they have no equipment or training.

I wish for a GTX Titan Z video card.

Granted. It does not fit in your computer, and your various attempts at making it fit just end up crashing andmaking a mess.

Enjoy an incompatible card!

I wish for GG.

Granted. You hate his voice.

I wish I could meet Chestnut in real life. He's cool.

Granted. However, you meet because you're hostages at a terrorist attack.

I wish for magic.

Granted. A wizard has turned you into a cake. Unfortunatelly,

is one of your friends.

I wish for a piece of cake.

Granted. The cake IS your friend.

I wish for KSP 1.0 to be released, so they can port it to Unity 5 (for those who dont know, U5 is released, but ksp 1.0 is to far in the making to port it, so they will/might port 1.1 to U5)

granted. The port permanently breaks the game.

I wish for a glass filled with potable water. (i'm not asking for a glass of water because I know what you guys will do with that one )

Granted, the water is portable, but the glass isn't. You can't pick it up, and don't even have a straw.

I wish water tasted better.
Granted. You are now living in the middle of Sahara desert...

Granted.

I wish for a good book.

Granted. Twilight is now considered a good book.

I wish for a good new song by Rammstein.

Granted.

It is Happy Birthday sung "Artistically"

The ensuing lawsuit makes sure he never makes another song.

I wish I could sue somebody.

Granted. You sue Microsoft and you lose. You pay all your money to your lawyer.

I wish I worked for CIA

Granted, aliens murder you.

I wish for Moose from CHAPPiE

Granted,A moose falls on your head.

I wish i was A aperture science smart panel.

Granted. You are the panel that gets detroyed during Weatley's fight scene.

I wish for the me to be the 10,000th post on this thread.

Very well. Your post is promptly deleted by moderators, and you no longer have any proof of it being so. (Waybackmachine and similar didnt save it, you did not screenshot)

I wish for SCIENCE!

Granted. But you only get science you already have.

I wish I could fly my VTOL without crashing at some point.

Granted, but you only have enough fuel for a five second flight.

I wish for three bars of rep.

granted. But just after getting it, the Kraken attack the forum again and you lose every single reputation points you have

(yeah, I can be mean sometime).

I wish I could go to Moho with more than 350 m/s left after the mission. I'm too stressed when I return to Kerbin because of that

Granted, you got to a Moho flyby, and have 351 m/s dV left. That was your mission, right?

I wish for this class to be more entertaining.

Granted, but the teacher notice you're on the KSP forum and not listening to him and confiscate [the device you use] for the whole week >:-)

I wish for 1.0

granted. Version 1.0 of Solitaire will be mailed to you soon.

I wish I had more and better artistic skills.
